paragraphs.text: Sizzle-crisps were a popular treat in the Fire Nation during the Hundred Year War.

paragraphs.body: Sizzle-crisps are a popular ${link_0} in the ${link_1}. They have a distinct crispy, bacon-like taste and are, in the style of typical Fire Nation foods, spicy-hot. Due to their taste, sizzle-crisps are widely believed to be made from meat, but there is a theory among some that they are actually vegetable-based and made from rice, soy, and nuts.
paragraphs.text: Sizzle-crisps are a popular treat in the Fire Nation. They have a distinct crispy, bacon-like taste and are, in the style of typical Fire Nation foods, spicy-hot. Due to their taste, sizzle-crisps are widely believed to be made from meat, but there is a theory among some that they are actually vegetable-based and made from rice, soy, and nuts.
